question: Magic vs. Pistons
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for December 8 at 7:00 PM ET:

If the Orlando Magic win, the market will resolve to “Magic”.

If the Detroit Pistons win, the market will resolve to “Pistons”.

 If the game is not completed by December 15, 2023 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Shohei Ohtani sign with Blue Jays?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Shohei Ohtani signs for the Toronto Blue Jays for 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will also resolve to “No” if it is announced that Ohtani has signed for any team other than the Toronto Blue Jays for 2024.

This market's resolution source will be official, credible announcements from either the Toronto Blue Jays or the signing team.

This market will stay open until it is definitively determined whether Shohei Ohtani will sign for the Blue Jays for 2024.

events.title: Will Shohei Ohtani sign with Blue Jays?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Shohei Ohtani signs for the Toronto Blue Jays for 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will also resolve to “No” if it is announced that Ohtani has signed for any team other than the Toronto Blue Jays for 2024.

This market's resolution source will be official, credible announcements from either the Toronto Blue Jays or the signing team.

This market will stay open until it is definitively determined whether Shohei Ohtani will sign for the Blue Jays for 2024.

question: Pudgy Penguins airdrop before March?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Pudgy Penguins launches a token and announces they have performed an airdrop by February 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market "locked" tokens or non-swappable tokens will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market is on-chain information and official information from the Pudgy Penguins team (e.g. https://www.pudgypenguins.com/, https://twitter.com/pudgypenguins), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Pudgy Penguins airdrop before March?

The primary resolution source for this market is on-chain information and official information from the Pudgy Penguins team (e.g. https://www.pudgypenguins.com/, https://twitter.com/pudgypenguins), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Taylor Swift pregnant before March?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if pop star Taylor Swift announces that she is pregnant between December 7, 2023, and February 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution sources for this market will be Taylor Swift's verified social media accounts (https://twitter.com/taylorswift13, https://www.instagram.com/taylorswift/, etc.), video footage of an announcement, a press release, an announcement through Taylor Swift's legal representative, however other credible reporting may be used.

This market will resolve “Yes” solely based on an announcement of pregnancy by Taylor Swift. Any announcement originating from another person will not result in a “Yes” resolution. If it is later revealed Taylor Swift was never pregnant after she announced she was pregnant, it will have no impact on the resolution of this market; only the announcement of pregnancy is necessary for a “Yes” resolution for this question.

events.title: Taylor Swift pregnant before March?
events.description:

This market will resolve “Yes” solely based on an announcement of pregnancy by Taylor Swift. Any announcement originating from another person will not result in a “Yes” resolution. If it is later revealed Taylor Swift was never pregnant after she announced she was pregnant, it will have no impact on the resolution of this market; only the announcement of pregnancy is necessary for a “Yes” resolution for this question.

question: Will Chris Christie drop out of presidential race in 2023?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Chris Christie officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from the 2024 US presidential race by December 31, 2023, 11:59 PM ET.

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Chris Christie from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

If Chris Christie does not drop out or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 Presidential Election by 11:59 PM ET on December 31, 2023, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Chris Christie or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Chris Christie drop out of presidential race in 2023?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Chris Christie officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from the 2024 US presidential race by December 31, 2023, 11:59 PM ET.

If Chris Christie does not drop out or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 Presidential Election by 11:59 PM ET on December 31, 2023, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Chris Christie or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Zelensky remain President of Ukraine through March?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Volodymyr Zelensky remains the President of Ukraine without interruption from December 7, 2023 through March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be the CIA World Factbook page for Ukraine, currently available at https://www.cia.gov/the-world-factbook/countries/ukraine/#government. A consensus of credible reporting will also suffice.

events.title: Will Zelensky remain President of Ukraine through March?
events.description:

question: Will Hamas surrender before February?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if, by January 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, Hamas officially announces a surrender in its conflict with Israel. "Surrender" refers to a formal acknowledgment of defeat, entailing a cessation of all military and hostile activities against Israel, and this must be communicated through an official statement recognized by international authorities or bodies.

The market will resolve to "No" if Hamas does not officially declare such a surrender by January 31, 2023. If the event of surrend
er occurs before the expiry date, the market will resolve immediately.

Resolution will be based on a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Will Hamas surrender before February?

The market will resolve to "No" if Hamas does not officially declare such a surrender by January 31, 2023. If the event of surrend
er occurs before the expiry date, the market will resolve immediately.

Resolution will be based on a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Devin Haney vs. Regis Prograis
description:
This market will resolve to "Haney" if Devin Haney is officially declared the winner of the boxing match against Regis Prograis, currently scheduled for December 9, 2023 at the Chase Center in San Francisco, California, USA. It will resolve to "Prograis" if Regis Prograis is declared the winner.

If this fight ends in a draw, is not officially designated as a win for either Devin Haney or Regis Prograis, is cancelled, or moved to a date after December 22, 2023, 11:59 PM PT, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Devin Haney vs. Regis Prograis
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Haney" if Devin Haney is officially declared the winner of the boxing match against Regis Prograis, currently scheduled for December 9, 2023 at the Chase Center in San Francisco, California, USA. It will resolve to "Prograis" if Regis Prograis is declared the winner.

If this fight ends in a draw, is not officially designated as a win for either Devin Haney or Regis Prograis, is cancelled, or moved to a date after December 22, 2023, 11:59 PM PT, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the Fed raise interest rates by 0 bps after its January meeting?
description:
The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if following the Federal Reserve's January 2024 meeting the upper bound of the target federal funds rate is exactly the same as the level it was prior to the meeting (namely it increased 0 bps). Otherwise, it will resolve to “No.”

The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after its meeting scheduled for January 30 - 31, 2024 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm.

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their December meeting with relevant data is issued. If no statement is released by February 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Fed Interest Rates: January 2024
events.description: qq

question: Will the Fed raise interest rates by 25 bps after its January meeting?
description:
The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if following the Federal Reserve's January 2024 meeting the upper bound of the target federal funds rate is increased exactly 25 basis points over the level it was prior to the meeting. Otherwise, it will resolve to “No.”

The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after its meeting scheduled for January 30 - 31, 2024 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm.

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their December meeting with relevant data is issued. If no statement is released by February 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Fed Interest Rates: January 2024
events.description: qq

question: Will the Fed decrease interest rates by 25 bps after its January meeting?
description:
The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if following the Federal Reserve's January 2024 meeting the upper bound of the target federal funds rate is decreased exactly 25 basis points below the level it was prior to the meeting. Otherwise, it will resolve to “No.”

The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after its meeting scheduled for January 30 - 31, 2024 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm.

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their December meeting with relevant data is issued. If no statement is released by February 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Logan Paul refund CryptoZoo investors by Jan 31?
description:

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will Israel start flooding Hamas tunnels by December 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel begins flooding Hamas tunnels with seawater by December 15, 2023, 11:59 IST (Israel Standard Time, GMT+2). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be announcements by the State of Israel, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
